CHAT.comment: SC and QU are playing upstairs; QU is at one end playing with pots and pans , SC is at the other end on the phone; SC hangs up phone and runs over to QU

u.a: QU and SC go to other end; SC pulls chair from corner to the table; QU picks up iron and makes pretend noises
SC is at stove; QU comes over; SC stands back; QU looks in the stove
SC sits down at the table; QU sets some dishes , then goes back to the stove
QU goes over to ironing board and iron , takes it back to stove , and puts iron in pot; SC gets up and follows him , watching
QU puts it back
points to something else
SC has turned around as QU talks and looks out
points to stairway
SC goes to other end and stands at shelf , looking over them to the steps; QU follows and goes to top of stairs
QU goes down the stairs
QU comes back up the stairs
points at girls; SC and QU looking downstairs
holds up two fingers
referring to girl at activity table
EL goes to bottom of stairs
EL comes up the stairs , SC and QU meet him at the stair entrance
all three look down to the lower level
JE enters downstairs playhouse , out of sight to the three boys , and picks up the stuffed bear and puts it on the table; he takes a plastic knife and stabs bear; JE begins eating bear
EL goes to stairs; SC follows him; EL turns around
EL goes downstairs
QU goes to the top of the stairs
SC and QU go downstairs , the upstairs is empty; the boys stand outside the downstairs area
the boys enter the area downstairs
the boys gather around the table and talk about
NI enters downstairs area
pushes NI out
SC leaves house and follows NI
SC and NI come back
points at NI
NI leaves area; SC goes upstairs
points to SC upstairs
NI starts going upstairs; immediately QU , JE and EL run after him up the stairs
JF goes upstairs
all leave and go downstairs to the table except for SC and NI who are playing in the upstairs corner
JE marches off , leaving area
calling out
SC and NI are upstairs , SC is on the phone
JE , QU , and EL sit around table cutting up bears
gives another bear to JE; JE takes it over to bed; NI starts going downstairs; SC runs after him
NI goes downstairs; SC goes back to other end of playhouse and plays with phone
NI enters downstairs playhouse
forcibly moves NI out of area
SC is at the fence looking downstairs and talking to the boys at the table
EL stomps back to area
SC is upstairs rocking the chair back and forth
all the boys scream and run outside except for NI
SC is calling to NI downstairs
SC runs downstairs
